des: "Always looking to lighten up my cocktails, I found a great way to make a fun beverage. And it's a great way to use brandy on those hot summer nights. Throw it all in the blender for a frosty, frozen beverage. Garnish with your choice: lime wedge, orange slice, or maraschino cherry."
ins: Fill a glass with ice, and pour in the brandy, peach schnapps, and ginger ale. Stir to mix.
